snippet: Mr. Spencer began his career at Honeywell as an aeronautical engineer and ended it with a long tenure at the top, shifting the company away from computers and toward aeronautics.
abstract: Edson W Spencer, former chief executive and chairman of Honeywell who shifted the company into aeronautics and industrial controls, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Spencer began his career at Honeywell as an aeronautical engineer and ended it with a long tenure at the top, shifting the company away from computers and toward aeronautics.

headline.seo: Edson W. Spencer, Longtime Chief of Honeywell, Dies at 85
headline.main: Edson W. Spencer, Who Turned Honeywell’s Attention to the Skies, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Edson W. Spencer, 85; Turned Honeywell’s Attention to the Skies
